talkJson.description: The Director of Facebook's AI Research, Dr. Yann LeCun gives a talk on deep convolutional neural networks and their applications to machine learning and computer vision (Johns Hopkins University, Center for Language and Speech Processing, 11/18/2014, Baltimore, MD)
talkJson.title: Yann LeCun - The Unreasonable Effectiveness of Deep Learning

node.title: OpenCV and High-Performance Vision on GPU
